name: Cycling Core
long_desc: Indoor cycling classes are riding on a stationary bike while getting a great workout, experiencing several styles of training, and listening to music.  All are welcomebeginner to advancedyou set the workout pace to various intensities.  This course is for those participants who want to gain knowledge and experience of riding for endurance, speed work, race training, strength training, andor visionary riding.    Each class will be formatted to take the rider to their levels of advancementbeginner to advancedall doing the same workout.  Bikes are provided.  No prior bike experience is necessary.  No special footwear requiredbike shoes are welcomeand tennis shoes at least are a must.    Come along for the ride of a lifetime while having fun and getting into shape.
